import classes from './Post.module.css' import close_btn_img from '../../img/close.svg' import $ from 'jquery' const Post = ({ post_img, post, postModalActive, setPostModalActive }) => { postModalActive ? $('body').css('overflow', 'hidden') : $('body').css('overflow', 'overlay'); const close_btn = (
setPostModalActive(false)} draggable="false" id="close_img" src={close_btn_img} alt="" />
) post = post.filter((n) => { return n !== '' }); post = post.filter((n) => { return n !== ' ' }); return ( <> {/*
setTimeout(() => setPostModalActive(false), 0)}>
e.stopPropagation()}> {close_btn}
{post.map((e, index) => (

{e}

))}
*/} setShow(false)} dialogClassName="modal-w" aria-labelledby="example-custom-modal-styling-title" > Custom Modal Styling
